articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Palestinian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Palestinian President

					 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority who is president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on the 23rd anniversary of the proclamation of the State of Palestine.
					
					 Kim in the message wished the president fresh success in his future work, expressing belief that the Palestinian people would surely emerge victorious in their just cause to found an independent state with Kuds as capital and retake their legitimate national rights.

articles.title: Congratulation to President of Ireland
articles.content:
Congratulation to President of Ireland 

					Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday sent a congratulatory message to Micheal Higgins on his election as President of Ireland.
					
					Kim in the message wished the Irish President success in his responsible work for prosperity of the country and welfare of its people.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Industrial Establishments in Chongjin
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Industrial Establishments in Chongjin

					 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Saturday made field survey of production and technological updating process at industrial establishments in Chongjin.
					
					 After touring the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Ranam Coal-mining Machine Complex and the Chongjin Steel Works which are making innovations in production of iron and steel and ordered equipment, he called consultative meetings of officials concerned at them.
					
					 Discussed at the meetings were such measures as to increase iron production by perfecting the Juche-based steel-making system and accelerating the construction of vertical furnace.
					
					 On Sunday the premier acquainted himself with production at the Kyongsong Insulator Factory and construction of Yombunjin Hotel on the spot.
